00045     bool Extractor::save(FeatureWriter& writer)
00046     {
00047         FeatureHeader hdr;
00048         hdr.type = type;
00049         hdr.frameLength = m_frameLength;
00050         hdr.paramsPerFrame = m_paramsPerFrame;

00062     bool Extractor::read(FeatureReader& reader)
00063     {
00064         FeatureHeader hdr;
00065         featureArray.clear();
00066         if (reader.read(hdr, featureArray))
00067         {
00068             type = hdr.type;
00069             m_frameLength = hdr.frameLength;
00070             m_paramsPerFrame = hdr.paramsPerFrame;
00071             wavFilename = hdr.wavFilename;
00072             timestamp = hdr.timestamp;
00073 
00074             return true;
00075         }
00076         else
00077         {
00078             return false;
00079         }
00080     }

00088     bool Extractor::isCompatible(Extractor* other) const
00089     {
00090         return getType() == other->getType() &&
00091                getParamsPerFrame() == other->getParamsPerFrame() &&
00092                getFrameLength() == other->getFrameLength();
